item.title: Denver Action NetworkDenver CommunistsLast night, 300 demonstrated against racist, misogynist violence against Asian-Americans in an area...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action NetworkDenver Communists

Last night, 300 demonstrated against racist, misogynist violence against Asian-Americans in an area once home to Denver‚Äôs Chinatown, before it was destroyed by ...racist whites in an 1880 race riot.

Unlike an earlier demonstration that featured the chief of police as a speaker, the politics from the front were on-point, thanks to the main organizer, a comrade who was in the streets all last summer and fall in the Black Lives Matter movement.

After weeks of relative hibernation, it was great to stand with the dedicated anti-racists we‚Äôve gotten to know through the George Floyd Rebellion, as well as a lot of new faces outraged by the recent violence against Asian women.

item.content:encoded:
Denver Action NetworkWITCH Denver

Activist training via Civil Liberties Defense Center

April 1, 2021
2:00 p.m. MT ‚Äî 4:00 p.m. MT
Webinar--information provided upon registration

...

With Indigenous resistance to the Line 3 pipeline that threatens Anishnaabe land (known as Minnesota) heating up, and the movement for Black Lives likely to ramp back up in the wake of continued police brutality, organizers on the ground should be prepared for potential arrests. Solidarity tactics keep individuals from being singled out, & can result in better jail & court outcomes while building movements‚Äô power.

Message us for the registration link!

item.title: Denver Action NetworkFront Range Community Defense...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action NetworkFront Range Community Defense Collective

ü¶Ñüè≥Ô∏è‚Äç‚ößü¶ôüè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàüè¥‚ö†Ô∏èALERT!‚ö†Ô∏èüè¥üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàü¶ôüè≥Ô∏è‚Äç‚ößü¶Ñ

The Tenacious Unicorn Ranch is under attack by local bigots and militia. They have threatened violence, publicly, to us and tho...se that help or associate with us. They have encroach on our property, armed, at night, with the intent to harm those of us that live here. We need help, we are not a militia, we are trans folk providing a safe haven for the queer community on an alpaca ranch. This threat has stripped us of our ability to work off ranch and to go about our lives. Financial aid will be used for our security needs.

Also to ensure our animals and residents are ok through this appalling show of bigoted violence. Volunteers are always appreciated to help keep everyone safe as we put security measures in place. We could not be a haven for trans folk without the love of our community, thank you all for your support and solidarity in this most trying time."

‚Äî The Tenacious Unicorn Ranch
@TenaciousRanch on Twitter

Who keeps us safe? WE KEEP US SAFE!

Source: https://twitter.com/TenaciousRa‚Ä¶/status/1368996977959047168‚Ä¶

item.title: PHONE ACTION Demand freedom for all! #ChingaLaMigra
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network

PHONE ACTION

Demand freedom for all! #ChingaLaMigra

Abolish ICE Denver

We are asking you to join us in this last effort to save Tien Pham from being deported to Vietnam. Tien is being held at a staging center used by ICE in Arizon...a. We hope to get a large number of calls made to the ICE Detention Center in Aurora Colorado from where his case is being managed.

Please also share widely! Here's information for the call:

Call ICE: 720-873-2899 then 1
Tien Pham

"Hi, my name is ____ and I represent ____ (organization, or city/county where you live). I am calling in strong support of Tien Pham #74515548 who is in transit, while his case continues to be managed from your office. Tien Pham is a refugee from Vietnam.,who spent years in a refugee camp and resettled into San Jose, CA after fleeing his war-torn country. After working hard to be found suitable for parole, Tien was transferred your facility. We‚Äôre asking for his deportation order to be reversed and he be allowed to join his family who welcome his return."

Your assistance is much appreciated! Somewhere around 6:30am and all morning help will likely be needed.

item.title: Report Back From #J20
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network

Report Back From #J20

Denver Communists

Before the BLM-Antifa #J20 action last week, the Denver Police hovered around Cheesman Park and harassed protestors as they arrived. Without citing them for any... crime, they took some comrades‚Äô helmets and told them they could collect them from the police station later if they provided ID.

This also happened at the BLM-Antifa Soup Drive, when the cops took various comrades‚Äô first aid supplies, water, helmets, and PPE. Clearly they did not treat the right wing that way that day, as evidenced by the bear-mace attack by Lee Keltner, the only violence that day that was not in self-defense. Keltner also carried a poorly concealed handgun and his son, an extendable baton.

The state likes to maintain its monopoly on violence, though it makes exceptions for the rich, the white, and the right wing. Far-right vigilante violence has always complimented the project of the racist, settler-colonial state. Whereas our project is to smash that state. There‚Äôs a reason for the double standard.

On #J20, when the cops tried to shake them down, our comrades Redd and Kountry of We The People 303 didn‚Äôt go quietly. They live-streamed the encounter, refused to have their belongings searched, and said they knew their rights. The cops arrested them, held them until the day‚Äôs festivities died down, and charged them for pepperspray and a belt buckle in the shape of non-functioning brass knuckles. And they asked Redd and Kountry if they were members of the Denver Communists. (Not yet! And don‚Äôt fuck up our recruitment game, pigs!)

We expect Redd and Kountry will beat these bogus charges, but they may need a lawyer to do so. If you can, please throw a little help their way:

Venmo Redd at @WeThePeople303
Cash App Kountry at @ $arizzle23

Here‚Äôs video of the arrests from two different points-of-view, including Redd‚Äôs:

https://twitter.com/WethePeople‚Ä¶/status/1351951978507558912‚Ä¶

https://www.facebook.com/wethepeople303/videos/259202422380112/

See More

item.title: Denver Action NetworkDenver Communists is with Cesar Ruiz.We mince no words: there can be no tolerance for the fascist creep. No politician,...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action NetworkDenver Communists is with Cesar Ruiz.

We mince no words: there can be no tolerance for the fascist creep. No politician, police force, or law will keep us safe from far-right violence. The only way ...to squash fascism is by facing it.

We‚Äôre saying we‚Äôre not afraid. We‚Äôre saying we abhor the far right more than we fear them! Not confronting the fascists is more dangerous than confronting them!

Join us Wednesday at BLM-Antifa #J20 and the Colorado inauguration March!
